tool_description: Generates detailed delivery schedules combining optimized routes with time windows and operational constraints.

route_sequences.description: Optimized delivery sequences for each route

delivery_windows.description: Time windows for deliveries in HH:MM-HH:MM format

travel_times.description: Travel times between locations in minutes

start_time.description: Daily operation start time in HH:MM format

service_time.description: Service time per delivery in minutes

error_messages: Array length mismatch: Route sequences and vehicle IDs arrays must have equal lengths.
Invalid time window format: Use HH:MM-HH:MM format for delivery windows.
Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for schedule date.
Invalid start time: Use HH:MM format for operation start time.
Service time out of range: Service time must be between 1 and 60 minutes.
usage: Provide route sequences, vehicle assignments, delivery windows, and timing constraints. Returns comprehensive delivery schedule with timestamps.

estimated_completion_times.description: Estimated completion times for each route

total_scheduled_duration.description: Total scheduled operation duration in minutes
